name: TextSelectionToolbar
desc: A fully-functional Material-style text selection toolbar.

fields.name: anchorAbove
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.TextSelectionToolbar.anchorAbove} The focal point above which the toolbar attempts to position itself.

fields.name: anchorBelow
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.TextSelectionToolbar.anchorBelow} The focal point below which the toolbar attempts to position itself, if it doesn't fit above [anchorAbove]. {@endtemplate}

fields.name: children
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.TextSelectionToolbar.children} The children that will be displayed in the text selection toolbar.
